wizard.title: Configure the Scoring Rules
wizard.presetIntroFull: To get started faster, choose a preset or fully customize:

CUMULATIVE.title: CUMULATIVE
CUMULATIVE.description: Points are ADDED up: Result (5/10 pts) + Home goals (2/4 pts) + Away goals (2/4 pts) + Difference (1/2 pts). Exact score = 10 pts in groups, 20 pts in knockouts.

BASIC.title: BASIC
BASIC.description: Only exact score for all matches. Points increase automatically in knockout rounds (groups: 20 pts, round of 16: 30 pts, final: 60 pts).
BASIC.shortDesc: Only exact score with increasing points

SIMPLE.title: SIMPLE
SIMPLE.description: No match scores. In group stage you order the teams in each group (10 pts per correct position, +20 pts if the complete group is perfect). In knockouts you just pick who advances.
SIMPLE.shortDesc: No scores: order groups, pick who advances

CUSTOM.title: CUSTOM
CUSTOM.description: Configure each phase manually according to your specific needs. Choose whether you want scores or not, what pick types to enable and how many points to assign to each one.

presetDescriptions.BASIC: Only exact score for all matches with auto-scaling (20 pts in groups -> 60 pts in final).
presetDescriptions.SIMPLE: No scores. In groups: order teams (10 pts per position + 20 pts perfect group bonus). In knockouts: pick who advances.
